com.wiris.plugin.api

Interface TextService


  • public interface TextService
    Provides transformation between different text format representation of formulas: MathML, LaTeX and plain text for accessibility.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String filter(java.lang.String str, java.util.Properties prop)
      Replaces <math> tags with <img> tags (images of the formulas)
      java.lang.String getMathML(java.lang.String digest, java.lang.String latex)
      Returns mathml knowing a digest or a latex
      java.lang.String latex2mathml(java.lang.String mml)
      Converts from latex to mathml.
      java.lang.String mathml2accessible(java.lang.String mml, java.lang.String lang, java.util.Properties prop)
      Returns the textual representation of a MathML suitable for accessibility.
      java.lang.String mathml2latex(java.lang.String mml)
      Converts from mathml to latex.
      java.lang.String service(java.lang.String serviceName, ParamsProvider provider)
      Generic entry point to any text interface.

      • filter

        java.lang.String filter(java.lang.String str,
                      java.util.Properties prop)
        Replaces <math> tags with <img> tags (images of the formulas)
